name: iNFOChannels
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: info channels
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The iNFO Channels skill provides access to your iNFO TV content such as messages, menus, activities, slideshows, announcements, events, and more. You can say show, play or open followed by any of the names or numbers listed on the tiles. For example, "show menu", "open messages ", "play number four", etc., and the requested content will be displayed. Say "go back" for the previous screen or say "show main menu" for the iNFO Channels home screen.

You will need a PIN if not automatically connected to an account upon opening the iNFO Channel skill. Request your 4-digit PIN by emailing infochannels@infotv.ca using the subject "PIN Request".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
